title: Admatha
html: ADMATHA(Ad·maʹtha) [from Persian, meaning “Unconquered”].One of the seven princes in the kingdom of Persia and Media who had access to King Ahasuerus. These princes concurred in the judgment against Queen Vashti, and apparently such a committee of seven regularly served the Persian kings as counselors.—Es 1:14; Ezr 7:14.
